name: elmo
description:
At elmo, we want everyone to drive an electric vehicle as soon as possible. 

We believe that new technology should benefit everyone and work for a brighter, cleaner future for our planet. 

Transport contributes 26% of all UK carbon emissions â€“ the largest of any sector; and all models suggest that â€˜electrificationâ€™ is the most viable and inevitable solution to this.

Our platform removes the cost and complexity from switching to an electric vehicle. We provide electric vehicles on low-cost and flexible monthly subscriptions with all services (charging, energy, insurance, maintenance and breakdown) included in the price.

We are the world's first 'total cost of ownership' subscription platform for electric vehicles.
